description: This table contains information from overtime single-response items about General Use Notes (HNO) records. Contact creation logic for clinical notes is as follows: 1. If a note doesn't exist, a new note is created. This represents the first contact on that note. 2. If a revision is filed by the incoming transcription interface, a new contact is created on the note being revised regardless of note status.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: COSIGN_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the note was cosigned.

columns.name: COSIGNUSER_ID
columns.description: The user who cosigned the note.

columns.name: COSIGN_NOTE_LINK
columns.description: A note contact serial number (CSN) that points to the attending's note that cosigned this one.

columns.name: COSIGN_REQUIRED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The cosign requirement for the current note contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cosign Required


Cosign Not Required


Cosigned

columns.name: AUTH_LNKED_PROV_ID
columns.description: The author's linked provider record.

columns.name: AUTHOR_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The author's clinical service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ENTRY_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: UTC formatted instant of entry for a note.

columns.name: UPD_AUTHOR_INS_DTTM
columns.description: UTC instant of update by a specific user.

columns.name: SPEC_NOTE_TIME_DTTM
columns.description: The note's specified date paired with the specified time.

columns.name: NOTE_FILE_TIME_DTTM
columns.description: UTC formatted instant of when a note is filed.

columns.name: AUTHOR_PRVD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Author's provider type on a specific contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Resource


Physician

columns.name: NOTE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the note.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Incomplete


Signed


Addendum


Deleted


Revised


Cosigned


Finalized


Unsigned


Cosign Needed


Incomplete Revision


Cosign Needed Addendum


Shared

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The id of the user who updated this contact of the note.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: TRN_DOC_AVAIL_STA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The availability status of the transcription.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Available


Unavailable


Obsolete


Deleted


Obsolete/Available


Obsolete/Unavailable


Soft Deleted

columns.name: TRN_DOC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The document type of the transcription.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SENSITIVE_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Sensitive status of a note.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Sensitive


Not Sensitive

columns.name: AUTHOR_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user who is the author of the note.

columns.name: NOTE_FORMAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The format of the note text like Plain Text, Rich Text, HTML etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Plain Text


Rich Text


HTML


Epic HTML


EpicML

columns.name: UPD_BY_AUTH_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the note is updated by the author.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_DTTM
columns.description: The activity date and time of the partial dictation/transcription.

columns.name: AUTH_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The authentication status category number for this activity if this note is a transcription. This is also known as the completion status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Dictated


In Progress


Incomplete


Pre-authenticated


Authenticated


Legally Authenticated

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: Contact number for the record.

columns.name: UPD_AUT_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Update by author instant in local format.

columns.name: ENT_INST_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Note entry instant in local format.

columns.name: SPEC_TIME_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: Note specified instant in local format.

columns.name: NOT_FILETM_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: Note file time in local format.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record who edited the note for this particular contact. This is populated for notes with note type 76-Simple Med Note, 77-Medication History, etc. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_NAME
columns.description: Contains the name of the multi-part document.

columns.name: UMRG_SRC_MEDPROB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Med Problem List record.

columns.name: ECG_COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments about the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_EDITED_USER_ID
columns.description: The person who edited the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_DIASTOLIC_BP
columns.description: The diastolic blood pressure taken from the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_SYSTOLIC_BP
columns.description: The systolic blood pressure taken from the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_HEARTRATE
columns.description: The heartrate from the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_PR_INTERVAL
columns.description: The interval from the beginning of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS wave on the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_PWAVEAXIS
columns.description: The P wave axis on the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_QRS_DURATION
columns.description: The duration of the QRS complex/wave on the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_QRS_WAVEAXIS
columns.description: The QRS complex/wave axis on the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_QT_INTERVAL
columns.description: The interval from the start of the QRS complex/wave to the end of the T wave on the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_QTC_INTERVAL
columns.description: The corrected QT interval for the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: ECG_T_WAVEAXIS
columns.description: The T wave axis for the Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG).

columns.name: SPIRO_BRON
columns.description: Stores the type of bronchodilator given to the patient (ex: Albuterol).

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_CSN_ID
columns.description: Link to care plan contact.  Used to recreate historic versions of care plan.

columns.name: PROGRESS_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Progress note ID for the careplan goal note.

columns.name: PRE_UCN_NOTE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This virtual item is populated with a category value from the note type (I HNO 50) according to the following logic:   * if the note type (I HNO 50) is populated, use the value directly * if the note type (I HNO 50) is null and the note is not ambulatory, return null   * if the note type (I HNO 50) is null and the note has an ambulatory encounter context, obtain a category from the UCN note type (I HNO 34033) and map that value to an equivalent category from the note type (I HNO 50), if possible


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General


Phone Message


Letter


Message


Telephone Encounter


Provider Comments


RTF Letter


Routing Comments


Specialty Comments


Charting Text


MyChart Message


Eligibility Message

AP Claim Code Edit

columns.name: TRANSCRIPTION_DTTM
columns.description: The transcription date and time.

columns.name: CSGN_RECPNT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user who is supposed to cosign the note.

columns.name: TREAT_SUMM_PAT_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the UTC instant that a treatment summary note is given to the patient.

columns.name: TREAT_SUMM_PROV_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the UTC instant that a treatment summary note is given to the follow-up provider.

columns.name: TREAT_SUMM_CPLT_DTTM
columns.description: This column saves the UTC instant that a treatment summary note is marked as complete.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the patient encounter contact serial number (CSN) in which the note was edited. Used for persistent notes to determine in which encounter the note was edited.

columns.name: END_OF_TREAT_DATE
columns.description: This column saves the end of treatment date for a treatment summary.

columns.name: UNMERGE_SRC_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The source note ID before patient merge.

columns.name: NOTE_SHARED_W_PAT_HX_YN
columns.description:
Was this note contact marked as eligible for sharing with the patient when it was last saved?  Notes will only be displayed in MyChart if their most recent contact is marked for sharing. If you want to determine if a note is currently shared, use the NOTE_SHARED_W_PAT_YN column in the HNO_INFO table instead of this one.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NOTE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Identifies what type of note this record is.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRE_UCN_NOTE_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: POC_NOTE_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the hospice Plan of Care note discipline.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COSIGN_INST_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The instant in local time when the note was cosigned.

columns.name: IS_PRECHARTED_YN
columns.description:
This indicates whether or not the note is currently a pre-charted note (in appointment encounter).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NOTE_SHARED_W_PAT_HX_YN

columns.name: LINK_DXR_CSN_ID
columns.description: Link to the DXR contact that holds the NoteReader data for this note's contact.

columns.name: CLINICAL_NOTE_SUMMARY
columns.description: This item stores a plain text summary of the note contents.

columns.name: BLOCK_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores a discrete reason why a note was blocked from the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BLOCK_REASON_TXT
columns.description: Stores a free text comment with additional information about why a note was blocked from the patient.
